summary: Mobile-first colorful Amazon-like marketplace app with strict role-based capabilities: customers can only shop (no data editing), vendors can only create/manage their own outlet and products (including photo upload), and admins can change/manage everything; built on ICP (Motoko) + React/Vite/shadcn with existing RBAC + RequireRole patterns.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold with main entrypoints
existing_features.description: Base Motoko backend wiring (main.mo) integrating authorization and blob storage modules as the core application canister foundation.

existing_features.title: Role-based authorization (admin/vendor/customer)
existing_features.description: Authorization layer implemented in Motoko (MixinAuthorization, access-control) to gate backend operations and support role checks used by the frontend RequireRole pattern.

existing_features.title: Blob storage canister module
existing_features.description: Motoko blob storage module (Storage, Mixin) for storing and serving binary assets, with a frontend StorageClient utility for access.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and components for Internet Identity sign-in (useInternetIdentity, useActor) including LoginButton and profile setup modal scaffolding.

existing_features.title: Route-level role enforcement UI
existing_features.description: Frontend components to enforce and display role-based access at the UI layer (RequireRole + AccessDeniedScreen).

existing_features.title: Storefront pages (home, categories, product, cart, checkout)
existing_features.description: Core shopping UI pages and components: Home (HeroBannerSlider, ProductGrid), Categories, Category Listing, Product page, Cart, and Checkout.

existing_features.title: Customer account pages (profile, orders, wishlist)
existing_features.description: Customer-facing authenticated pages for managing profile, viewing orders, and wishlist.

existing_features.title: Vendor portal pages (dashboard, products, orders)
existing_features.description: Vendor-facing pages for managing products and viewing vendor orders, with a vendor dashboard landing page.

existing_features.title: Admin console pages (dashboard, products, orders, vendors)
existing_features.description: Admin-facing pages for managing products, orders, and vendors with an admin dashboard.

existing_features.title: Application layout and navigation (top/bottom nav)
existing_features.description: Reusable layout shell and navigation components (TopNav, BottomNav, AppLayout) connecting the storefront and role-based sections.

existing_features.title: React/Vite frontend scaffold with shadcn/ui component library
existing_features.description: Frontend build system and UI foundation including Tailwind, shadcn/ui component set, and lint rules ensuring II provider requirements.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP project
existing_features.description: Project template artifacts for building and deploying (Dockerfile, deploy scripts, ICP configuration, workspace/package setup).

existing_features.title: Mobile-first landing screen with Customer/Vendor login CTAs
existing_features.description: Replaced/updated the home landing experience to provide two prominent primary actions (“Customer Login” and “Vendor Login”) using the existing mobile navigation shell.

existing_features.title: Customer onboarding form and city-filtered vendor discovery list
existing_features.description: Customer onboarding/login screen (Name, Mobile, City (Kanpur/Unnao), Area, Pin code) with post-submit navigation to a vendor list screen filtered by selected city and vendor cards (Outlet name, Area, Mobile, View Shop).

existing_features.title: Vendor shop page filtered to selected vendor products
existing_features.description: Customer “View Shop” experience that opens a vendor shop page and lists only products for the selected vendor (reusing existing product grid/card patterns).

existing_features.title: Vendor onboarding flow: vendor login form + outlet details screen
existing_features.description: Vendor onboarding/login screen (Name, Mobile, City (Kanpur/Unnao), Area, Pin code) followed by an Outlet Details screen capturing outlet information (including picture upload field and IDs) and then routing into a vendor dashboard entry page.

existing_features.title: Backend vendor outlet profile data model + migration (city/area/pin/outlet fields, IDs, picture, status)
existing_features.description: Motoko backend extended to store and serve outlet-specific vendor fields (city, area, pin code, outlet name/mobile, outlet picture via blob storage, Aadhar, optional GST) plus outlet status (Enabled/Disabled), with migration support and APIs consumable by customers (discovery), vendors (create/update), and admins (management).

existing_features.title: Backend vendor wallet commission rules + outlet auto-disable/enable
existing_features.description: Motoko backend implements vendor wallet business rules: add 10% commission per order to wallet due; enforce 1000 INR wallet limit; auto-disable outlet when due >= 1000; provide backend action to reset wallet due to 0 and re-enable outlet.

existing_features.title: Vendor Dashboard wallet/status UI with “Pay Company” action
existing_features.description: Vendor dashboard updated to show outlet name, status (Enabled/Disabled), total sales, and wallet due (INR formatting) in a mobile-first card layout, including a “Pay Company” button that calls the backend reset/pay action and refreshes UI state.

existing_features.title: Admin vendor management: outlet enable/disable, wallet dues, and orders overview
existing_features.description: Admin console extended to manage vendors with outlet details, view wallet due amounts, enable/disable vendor outlets, and view total orders/overview using existing admin orders data where available.

existing_features.title: Bright, colorful, mobile-first theme applied to onboarding/vendor flow screens
existing_features.description: UI styling updated for the new Customer/Vendor flow screens to consistently use bright colors, rounded cards, soft shadows, large buttons, and mobile-friendly spacing with English labels.

existing_features.title: Strict role capability enforcement across UI + backend APIs (customer/vendor/admin)
existing_features.description: End-to-end enforcement of strict role capabilities: customers are limited to shopping-only flows; vendors are limited to creating/managing their own outlet profile plus CRUD on their own products and photo uploads; all admin management screens and backend mutation APIs are restricted to admins. Frontend routes/navigation use RequireRole/AccessDenied patterns and backend Motoko authorization guards enforce the same constraints.

existing_features.title: PWA offline-ready assets (manifest, service worker, offline fallback, icons)
existing_features.description: Frontend now includes Progressive Web App assets: web manifest, service worker registration/logic, an offline fallback page, and generated app icons (including maskable) to support installable, offline-tolerant behavior.

Update PWA icon assets to match the new QuickBazar branding by regenerating the existing icon files referenced by the manifest (keep the same filenames/paths so the manifest references remain valid).

Replace/remove existing logo and add a new good-looking logo (designer choice) for QuickBazar.

architectural_notes: Frontend is React + Vite + Tailwind with shadcn/ui components and shared AppLayout navigation shell.
Authentication uses Internet Identity; UI includes login flow and profile setup modal scaffolding.
Authorization is enforced via Motoko RBAC (access-control + authorization mixin) and mirrored in frontend via RequireRole/AccessDenied patterns.
Binary assets are handled via a Motoko blob-storage module with a frontend StorageClient helper.
Project includes an ICP-focused build/deploy template (icp.yaml, deploy.sh, Dockerfile) for reproducible builds.
Authorization and blob-storage Motoko components updated to v4.0.0 (componentized modules used by backend/main.mo).
Core infrastructure component updated to v1.0.2 alongside authorization/blob-storage v4.0.0 integrations in backend/main.mo.
Build template now includes image asset maintenance scripts (resize-images.js, prune-unused-images.js) for generated frontend assets.

Build-template React frontend now vendors full shadcn/ui component sources plus custom ESLint rules (require Internet Identity provider; prevent BigInt in query keys) for consistent ICP/II-ready apps.
Frontend now includes PWA assets (manifest.webmanifest, sw.js, offline.html, generated icons) to support installable and offline-tolerant behavior.
